scripts.postinstall: npm --workspace shared run build && npm --workspace server run prisma:generate
scripts.dev: npm --workspace shared run build && npm run db:push && concurrently "npm --workspace server run dev" "npm --workspace client run dev"
scripts.build: npm --workspace shared run build && npm --workspace client run build && npm --workspace server run build
scripts.start: npm run db:push && npm --workspace server run start
